titleStmt.title: A true copie of the petition of the knights, iustices of the peace, and other gentlemen, ministers and free-holders (in number many thousands) of the county of Monmouth, exhibited May 17. 1642. To the honourable the knights, citizens, and burgesses assembled in the house of Commons.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by order of the petitioners, for William Larnar, at the signe of the Bible in little East-Cheape,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the signe of the Bible in little East-Cheape
